website_summaries.verdict: A well-built, flat-free tire and rim assembly that makes replacing the tire on your wheelbarrow nearly effortless.
pros: Customers appreciate the vibrant blue rim on this highly rated tire
The non-pneumatic design means you will never have to repair a flat or fill this tire with air
It features a 6-inch hub with a 5/8-inch bore
cons: There is no grease fitting on this tire, which can make bearing maintenance a little more time-intensive

customer_reviews.title: One for one replacement, easy-peezy
customer_reviews.text: i replaced a wheel, tire and inner-tube assembly with this part (wheelbarrow application). the old inner-tube had a slow leak which i lived with for years. thankfully i have an air compressor but the leak evolved into a real nuisance and so decided to look into this item as a replacement. it was a little more than i wanted to pay but the final result was successful and i now have a wheelbarrow that i can use on a moments notice without tire worries.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Austin

customer_reviews.title: I've fixed the flat tire for the last time.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old wheelbarrow, I just cudnt let it die, I've fixed the flat tire for the last time. I will have to replace the handles at some point, but for now we are back in business hauling firewood, dirt and junk. This tire actually looks too good for the old beast, heavy duty, flat free, I'm in okie heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: never flat enough said
customer_reviews.text: I ran over a nail using my wheel barrel. seen this when I was looking to buy a new tire. great tire never have to add air don't have to worry about running over nails. the tire is stiff at first but softens up after a few uses. I have 3 wheel barrels and when the other tires go bad I will buy another one of theses
customer_reviews.author: Rod Moneysmith

customer_reviews.title: NO More Flats
customer_reviews.text: No More Flat Tire....Yay! Due to the 6" center, had to modify the axle bracket on my wheelbarrow by cutting off about an inch on each bracket with my cut-off tool, thus allowing for a perfect fit! Cannot be any more pleased with this purchase decision...it's been long over-due! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Carefully watch your dimensions!
customer_reviews.text: Had to modify for 6” hub. 2 beer job with clean-up. Make sure you measure your hub width. Had to remove 1” each side of shaft mount, quick job for Metabo and a good chance to grease everything.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Analysist

customer_reviews.title: Flat free
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good tire with average light loads. However, when you load up the wheel barrow with a heavy load it feels squishy, as if it needed air (which we know can’t be added). On the plus side, it won’t go flat over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Halwax

customer_reviews.title: Beats filling the air, no problems with the stiffness
customer_reviews.text: Every time I went to use my wheelbarrow with my old air filled tire, I would need to get out the pump. Looking forward to not having to do that anymore. I did not have any problem with the tire being too stiff as others mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and should last forever
customer_reviews.text: This is the Perfect fit and should last forever If you’re tired of hauling out your wheelbarrow only to find the tires flat, replace your old tires and rims with these. They never go flat and should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability is what I found with these tires!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to finally have tires for our wheelbarrow that don’t need tubes! Why did we wait so long to get them? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: No more pumping!
customer_reviews.text: Nice replacement for Jackson wheelbarrow. Not great under heavy loads. Kind of squishy. But... Beats needing to pump a wheelbarrow tire... So 5 stars! Cool color.
customer_reviews.author: Jake H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad copy of an airless tire
customer_reviews.text: Tire sounds like it is rolling over bubble wrap when you out anything in the wheelbarrow and walk with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mauck

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a lovely light blue and would match our wheelbarrow perfectly but when we received it the color was almost black it is a very dark blue. We are keeping it but should get a discount for the wrong description.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: It will be nice to have the same flat free wheel but with plastic rim so we can use it on the beach near the sea.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement tire for my thirty year old wheelbarrel. The tire is firm and ok with me as compared to an air tire. AND, No Chinese rubber smell!
customer_reviews.author: BBQ TOUR USA

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit great finally no more flats Should have did this long ago
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Product is great!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to try this out as we have several projects this year! Easy installation, took my husband minutes to put it on. We have spent alot of money trying to save the original tire and from what I have seen with this product it should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made Product
customer_reviews.text: This wheel fit my contractor-wheelbarrow perfectly. As it requires no air....it will never be flat again! Great product and service.
customer_reviews.author: michael j's

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent delivery. Great wheel. Fit perfect. Even matches my blue wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.author: careyfla

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good quality and I like the bright blue wheels
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be good quality and I like the bright blue wheels, really freshens the look of the ole' wheelbarrow. But, the best thing is no more flat tires!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good No Hassle Tire
customer_reviews.text: Some flat free tires can’t take the weight of a loaded wheelbarrow, this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Hayduke

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly on my Jackson wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid rubber tire. No air is needed.
customer_reviews.author: sixtallpines

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install the only problem I had was I had to cut a quarter inch off my existing mounting brackets because it was half an inch wider than the original wheel
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Peecher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation fit perfectly and seems very sturdy. Can't speak to longevity only has been mounted for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Don Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Just measure correctly
customer_reviews.text: It wobbles a bit. I will figure out something. But it works and it didn’t before with a flat one.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl reams kelly

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.Easy to install.Hub was sticking out of box when it arrived,no damage seen as far as I could tell.
customer_reviews.author: collector

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice replacement for the leaky tire and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Nz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on my old Wheelbarrow! No more flat tires!
customer_reviews.author: W. E. Hella

customer_reviews.title: The works grate and its easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: The works grate and its easy to put on. There is a little give to the tire also, not to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Forget air filled wheelbarrow tires!
customer_reviews.text: Best replacement value and functionality for contractors wheelbarrow. Great load capacity.
customer_reviews.author: PIERRE P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wheel Replacement For an Old Sears Wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: This rim/tire fit my old Sears Craftsman wheelbarrow perfectly. Part number on the wheelbarrow is 452.8710
customer_reviews.author: PaulE

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - no more flat tires for this gardener! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great product and deal!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than others and durable. Easily changed out and no more inflating!!
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color but good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Color is actually an UGLY green. Not the nice blue. That sucks. Otherwise the wheel is a good buy. I didnt care for the cheap bearings so I replaced them with XiKe 4 Pack Flanged Ball Bearing ID 5/8" x OD 1-3/8" I bought here on amazon. You can buy those bearings with a different inside diameter to fit different sizes of axles. Stock bearings will work but are very sloppy. Also the welded front rim on this is straight and not wobbly like the martin brand wheel i originally tried. Solid amazon buy
customer_reviews.author: Bellworx

product_meta.title: NK WFF16BK Flat-Free Wheelbarrow Tire with Ribbed Tread 6"-Inch Centered Hub 5/8"-Inch Bearings - 15.5"-Inch Tire Diameter, 4.80/4.00-8

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
